training.input_x_train: This is the worst hotel ever!

On 4/7 my flight got canceled by Frontier, noreservation flight was found to fit my schedule. I had to cancel my hotel reservation, I emailed the hotel and Booking.com, the hotel refunded the full amount to Booking.com since the reservationwas made through them, Booking.com refunded me $24.65 out of $486.92, this a rubbery, they’re not even interested in offering credit for near future rebooking. It’s ver frustrating that they’re getting away with this sleazy business practices.

Hi horrible experience with the site

They cancelled my booking 3 days prior to travel. I could not get any hotel room in Srinagar

I had booked 1 month in advance

Horrible people

Horrible customer support

Not trusted, discriminate, abusive service - outstanding nonsense treatment - our service are down of the minimum.

Couldn't comminution create outgoing, just treatment and phishing.

The property 1 start are fake, and dangerous provocative.

Just incident then not accomodations or not refund.

Disappointed

Spam online campaign
